name: Sausage Tug
description:
Made by JonesyWolf and Drimzon.

Controls:

Black dog - WASD to move

Brown dog - Arrow keys to move

Try to get your sausages to the blue zone to win. Spiky things break your sausages, Good luck.

This was our first game that was not quite on time for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam, whose theme was "joined together" but I figured we'd upload it anyway.
